work.title: <u>Tech Lead (React, React Native, Storybook, JS, LLM)</u>
description: AI Agent Development: Built an AI agent for the apparel industry on web and mobile using React, React Native, and ML models.
UI Component Library: Developed a scalable component library with Storybook and custom CSS.
Team Mentorship: Mentored 8+ developers, enhancing their skills and project outcomes.
ERP Solution: Led the development of Groyyo Plus, an ERP solution with a React Native app and React dashboard.

work.title: <u>Senior Product Developer (React, Material UI, Figma, Tailwind)</u>
description: UI Development Lead: Led the UI development for Intent360, including modules like Quality, Production, Planning, and Inventory, using React-, Material UI, Figma, and Tailwind CSS
User-Friendly Interfaces: Built intuitive UIs focused on enhancing usability and user experience.

work.title: <u>Product Developer (Next.js, Cypress, MUI)</u>
description: Core Product UI & Landing Pages: Delivered seamless UI for core products and dynamic marketing landing pages, driving user engagement.
E-commerce System: Built an e-commerce platform with dynamic product displays and optimized checkouts using Next.js.

work.title: <u>Software Engineer(Gatsbi, MUI, CMS, styled component, cypress, seo)</u>
description: Front-End Development: Led the development of Front End UI and marketing pages using Gatsby and ReactJS, ensuring a seamless user experience and brand consistency
Testing & Quality Assurance: Implemented test cases with Cypress to validate UI functionality and deliver high-quality outputs.
SEO Optimization: Optimized web pages for SEO, boosting search engine rankings and improving organic visibility.
Styling Frameworks: Utilized Material UI and Styled Components to enhance styling effciency and user engagement.
Headless CMS Integration: Integrated Contentful for backend management and employed GraphQL for effcient content querying.
UI Documentation: Leveraged Storybook for comprehensive UI documentation, promoting collaboration and consistency across teams.

work.title: <u>Co-founder and Web Engineer</u>
description: Product Development: Oversaw the end-to-end digital product lifecycle, from design and development to testing and deployment.
E-commerce Platform: Architected and built an e-commerce platform using Figma and the MERN stack, enhancing scalability and user experience.
Team Leadership: Directed a team of 8 developers, ensuring collaboration and timely achievement of project milestones.
Process Optimization: Analyzed operational requirements and implemented automation solutions to streamline processes and boost effciency.

work.title: <u>Web Developer (HTML, CSS, JS, WordPress, PHP)</u>
description: Custom WordPress Development: Designed and developed custom WordPress themes to meet client-specifc requirements, improving functionality and aesthetics.
Dynamic Web Pages: Utilized JavaScript to create interactive web pages, enhancing user engagement and experience.
Email Filter Tool: Engineered an email flter tool to assist the email marketing team in reducing spam rates and optimizing campaigns.
Email Marketing Tool: Led the development of an email marketing tool-, enabling the management of high-value transactions exceeding millions of dollars.

work.title: <u>Intern (HTML, CSS, JS, WordPress)</u>
description: Email Campaigns: Led email campaign initiatives with the marketing team, driving impactful outreach and effective communication
UI Support: Translated marketing team UI requirements into actionable design solutions.
WordPress Development: Gained expertise in WordPress, developing and managing multiple dynamic blog websites.
Landing Pages: Designed and implemented static landing pages, enhancing user engagement and boosting conversion rates.
